contentPageHeader.summary: Read the Economic Survey of Singapore, which we produce on a quarterly basis, here. Each report contains analyses of the overall Singapore economy and its various economic sectors.

page.title: Economic Survey of Singapore
page.description: Read the Economic Survey of Singapore, which we produce on a quarterly basis, here. Each report contains analyses of the overall Singapore economy and its various economic sectors.

infoBoxes.title: Economic Survey of Singapore
infoBoxes.description: Key statistical data such as on the labour market, productivity, industrial production, investments, retail activity, tourism and trade are available here.

infoBoxes.title: Feature Articles
infoBoxes.description: Additional articles on economics and trade issues, published on an ad-hoc basis, are posted here.
